name: Untitled Hat Adventure
description:
Prologue

Collect hats. Eat grass. Defeat the Abeemination.

Controls

WASD - Move, W to jump

LMB - Shoot

R - Reload

Credits to

DevStuffz - Programming

Rhysimus - Programming

VerryEgg - Art

Bithium - Music

*Note this is uncompleted but more than playable. Many more fixes/features to come!
